channel.title: Breakfast on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Breakfast on Recipes

item.title: Steamed Boiled Eggs
item.description: Steamed Boiled Eggs # Ingredients # (Optional) 1 tray of ice cubes 6 large eggs Equipment Needed # Large pot Steamer insert Instructions # If serving eggs cold, add 1 tray of ice cubes to a large bowl and fill with water. Add 1 inch of water to a large pot. Place steamer insert inside, cover, and bring to a boil over high heat. Add eggs to steamer basket, cover, and continue cooking, 7 minutes for soft-boiled eggs or 14 minutes for hard-boiled.

item.title: Beignets
item.description: Beignets # Ingredients # 1/4 tsp. dry yeast 2 Tbsp. warm water; 105Â°F 2 Tbsp. granulated sugar 1 Tbsp. vegetable shortening 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 cup heavy cream 1/2 egg 2 cups (278 grams) all-purpose flour 1/4 cup boiling water Vegetable oil for frying Confectioner’s sugar for dusting Instructions # Sprinkle yeast over warm water in a small bowl, stirring to dissolve. Let stand for 5 minutes. Combine sugar, shortening, salt, heavy cream, egg, flour and boiling water in a large bowl; stir in yeast mixture.
